infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Sober Motivation uses your location to send you gentle reminders when you're near a bar or liquor store, helping you make mindful choices in real-time.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Sober Motivation uses your location to send you gentle reminders when you're near a bar or liquor store, helping you make mindful choices in real-time.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Sober Motivation needs access to your location even when the app is closed to provide important notifications and support. This helps us send you alerts when you're near a bar or liquor store, encouraging you to make mindful choices.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Sober Motivation needs access to your location in the background to provide important notifications and support. This helps us send you alerts when you're near a bar or liquor store, encouraging you to make mindful choices.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Get Daily Motivation - plus get alerts when people like, follow, or comment on your posts. These can be configured in Settings.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Sober Motivation uses your camera so you can record video messages.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Sober Motivation uses your microphone for audio in your video messages.
